predicate.note: Frames file for 'subject' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry.

roleset.name: cause to experience some procedure

example.name: passivized
example.text: That meant no trading would occur in the final seconds, as a way of making sure that last-second orders aren't subjected *trace* to a sudden price swing that would upset customers.
example.arg: a sudden price swing that would upset customers

example.name: with causer
example.text: Mary subjected John to a full-scale interrogation when he came home late one night.
example.arg: when he came home late one night

roleset.note: Odd that 'subject' and 'object' (as verbs) have nothing to do with each other.
